attributes.action: Centralise all powers to combat swine flue to Westminster under national security grounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the H1N1 or swine influenza virus infects Britain with ever growing speed we urge the Prime Minister to take all powers to  fight against such a biological threat away from the: Scottish, Welsh and Northern Irish governments as soon as possible and centralise these powers under Westminster as to facilitate a national action plan on grounds of national security.

We believe it is constitutional wrong and dangerous to the public health to leave these matters to be dealt with by local governments as this virus poses a threat to all of the United Kingdom and as such, must be handled with proper parliament in London.
